survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace AI Tool Adoption Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the adoption and effectiveness of AI-powered tools in the workplace, focusing on usability, benefits, and potential areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the AI-powered tools currently available in your workplace?
answer_options: Very familiar, I use them regularly
Somewhat familiar, I have used them a few times
Not very familiar, I have heard about them but not used them
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure familiarity levels. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the AI-powered tools currently available in your workplace?
answer_options: Very familiar, I use them regularly
Somewhat familiar, I have used them a few times
Not very familiar, I have heard about them but not used them

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered tools have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents except those who selected 'Not at all familiar' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture multiple tool usage. Consider randomizing the order of options.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered tools have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents except those who selected 'Not at all familiar' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered tools provided by your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected at least one tool in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure clear labeling of scale points.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered tools provided by your workplace?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected at least one tool in Q2

questions.question_text: What benefits have you experienced from using AI-powered tools at work? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected at least one tool in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture multiple benefits. Randomize options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: What benefits have you experienced from using AI-powered tools at work? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected at least one tool in Q2

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using AI-powered tools at work? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Difficulty learning how to use the tools
Lack of integration with existing systems
Limited access or availability of tools
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected at least one tool in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture multiple challenges. Include an option for no challenges.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using AI-powered tools at work? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Difficulty learning how to use the tools
Lack of integration with existing systems
Limited access or availability of tools
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected at least one tool in Q2

questions.question_text: What additional AI-powered tools or features would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional AI-powered tools or features would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
